alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 28 at 1:13PM MDT until October 29 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM MDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 14 possible. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 10 AM MDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
